p: SARS-CoV-2 spike protein-loaded NPs can be prepared to either block virus entry or activate the immune system to form antibodies against the virus. In addition, liposomes and nano-emulsion can dissolve the lipid bilayer envelope of the virus and destroy its structure, and inorganic NPs (Ag NPs) can effectively-initiate extracellular reactive-oxygen species (ROS) to kill the virus (El-Batal et al. 2018).
